ComicInfo.Title: The Colliding Divide
ComicInfo.Summary:
Aspen's newest hit series continues! Conrad arrives in Sinmora, and is shocked to find out that Lola's life may be in danger. Meanwhile, a weakened and bloodied Wasteland Trading Co. finally find solace in a small town that may prove hopeful for a post-apocalyptic future ahead. However, Lola soon realizes that looks can be deceiving, and nothing is as it seems in the Wasteland-and this mistake could be her last! One of 2014's most exciting debuts, LOLA XOXO is ready to take you on an incredible adventure unlike any other!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Siya Oum | 1 | B | Cover B | Alé Garza & Siya Oum | 2 | C | 1:12 Limited Edition Retailer Incentive Cover C | Siya Oum | 3 | D | Aspenstore.com Exclusive Black Friday Cover, Limited to 200 | Siya Oum | 4 |
